Maybe we could get into a discussion of what constitutes the "best" samurai=
,
or even what constitutes a "good" samurai? There would be plenty of argum=
ent
here over the issue of what makes a "good" samurai. Is it skill in weap=
onry?
Is it courage? Is it loyalty? Is it general character? 

Nina Boal
